goals__remit: Subsidiary of ENGIE Romania, Distrigaz Sud Retele is the first distribution company in Romania, having 30 years of experience in this field. The company operates, maintains and develops the biggest distribution network in Southern Romania (19,000 km, ~60% of the entire distribution network) serving more than 20 partners. Distrigaz Sud Retele also guarantees the quality of the distribution service and ensures the safe operation of the system and installations.
